archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.9.8b: b) designing each FIAM connection (e.g. determining how user access rights are managed, agreeing the structure of identifiers and attributes for users and approving the approach for provisioning user accounts, and updating contractual requirements)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
